#{userId}

SELECT ag.grid_name gridName, pag.grid_name parentGridName FROM area_grid ag LEFT JOIN area_grid pag ON pag.id = ag.grid_parent WHERE ag.id = #{gridId} AND ag.is_deleted = '0' AND ag.is_disabled = '0'

SELECT ag01.id,IFNULL(CONCAT(ag01.grid_name,'(',ag02.grid_name,')'),ag01.grid_name) grid_name FROM area_grid ag01 LEFT JOIN area_grid ag02 ON ag01.grid_parent=ag02.id WHERE ag01.is_deleted='0' AND ag01.is_disabled='0' AND ag01.grid_level=#{areaGrid.gridLevel}

SELECT DISTINCT (agm.grid_member),
IFNULL(prec.idcount, '0') numberPatrols,
IFNULL(pta1.countId, '0') nReported,
IFNULL(pta2.countId, '0') yReported,
IFNULL(pta3.countId, '0') reportsTotal,
IFNULL(cin.countId, '0') findTermination,
IFNULL(cin1.countId, '0') processingWorkOrder,
IFNULL(jiaoban.countId, '0') getThouth,
IFNULL(swpt.countId, '0') reportsBack FROM area_grid_member agm LEFT JOIN (
SELECT pr.crt_user_id ,count(pr.crt_user_id) idcount FROM patrol_record pr WHERE pr.patrol_status = '1' AND pr.start_time between #{monthStart} AND #{monthEnd} GROUP BY pr.crt_user_id ) prec ON prec.crt_user_id = agm.grid_member
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pt.crt_user_id ,count(pt.crt_user_id) countId from patrol_task pt where pt.is_problem = '0' AND pt.crt_time between #{monthStart} AND #{monthEnd} GROUP BY pt.crt_user_id ) pta1 ON pta1.crt_user_id = agm.grid_member
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pt.crt_user_id ,count(pt.crt_user_id) countId from patrol_task pt where pt.is_problem = '1' AND pt.crt_time between #{monthStart} AND #{monthEnd} GROUP BY pt.crt_user_id ) pta2 ON pta2.crt_user_id = agm.grid_member
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pt.crt_user_id ,count(pt.crt_user_id) countId FROM patrol_task pt WHERE pt.crt_time between #{monthStart} AND #{monthEnd} AND pt.status = 'root_biz_partolTaskT_stop' GROUP BY pt.crt_user_id ) cin ON cin.crt_user_id = agm.grid_member
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pt.crt_user_id ,count(pt.crt_user_id) countId from patrol_task pt WHERE pt.crt_time between #{monthStart} AND #{monthEnd} GROUP BY pt.crt_user_id ) pta3 ON pta3.crt_user_id = agm.grid_member
LEFT JOIN ( select ci.crt_user_id ,count(ci.crt_user_id) countId from case_info ci WHERE ci.crt_time = ci.upd_time and ci.is_finished = '1' AND ci.crt_time between #{monthStart} AND #{monthEnd} GROUP BY ci.crt_user_id ) cin1 ON cin1.crt_user_id = agm.grid_member
LEFT JOIN( SELECT task.PROC_TASK_ASSIGNEE userId,COUNT(task.PROC_TASK_ASSIGNEE) countId FROM scp_workflow.scp_wf_proc_task task where FROM_UNIXTIME(task.PROC_TASK_COMMITTIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') between #{monthStart} and #{monthEnd} and task.PROC_PTASKCODE = 'gridMemberNode' and task.PROC_CTASKCODE = 'processing' GROUP BY task.PROC_TASK_ASSIGNEE ) jiaoban on jiaoban.userId = agm.grid_member
LEFT JOIN ( select task.PROC_TASK_ASSIGNEE userId,count(task.PROC_TASK_ASSIGNEE) countid from scp_workflow.scp_wf_proc_task task where FROM_UNIXTIME(task.PROC_TASK_COMMITTIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') between #{monthStart} and #{monthEnd} and task.PROC_CTASKCODE = 'processing' and PROC_PTASKCODE = 'toFinish' group by task.PROC_TASK_ASSIGNEE ) swpt on swpt.userId = agm.grid_member
